title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.3 - Records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.3 - Records access officer

State Regulations
(a) The
designated records access officer of the commission is Marsha Bird, research
analyst. (b) Requests to inspect or
to obtain a copy of records in the custody of any officer or employee of the
commission shall be submitted in writing either in person or by mail to the
public access records officer on a form to be prescribed and furnished by such
officer. Records shall be available for inspection at the office on all regular
business days from 9:30 a.m. to 11:30 a.m. and from 1:30 p.m. to 4
p.m. (c) The designated records
access officers may be contacted in Room 944, Legislative Office Building, Albany, New York 12224 or by telephone (518) 472- 8300. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1100.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
